Hunters are rougue-like gunslingers; nimble, fleetfooted, and quick on the draw. Choose this class if you are a good shot and enjoy moving fast.


Titans are unbreakable bulwarks who stand like walls against their foes. Pick this class if you like soaking up damage and dishing it out too.


Warlocks are mages and scholars of the light which gives all guardians power. Pick this class if you enjoy using supportive and offensive abilities.
